description: Take a Woolworths chocolate mud cake, add two more ingredients and create a batch of decadent truffles. It doesn't get easier than this dessert recipe.
name: Chocolate Mud Cake Truffles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place cake in a large bowl. Using a wooden spoon or potato masher, break up cake until coarsely crumbled.
Stir chocolatehazelnut spread into cake crumbs until combined.
Line a baking tray with baking paper. Roll level tablespoonfuls of cake mixture into balls to make a total of 24 truffles. Place on tray and freeze for 15 minutes or until just firm.

Meanwhile, place chocolate in a medium microwavesafe bowl. Microwave on high for 1 minute, stirring halfway, or until melted. Drizzle chocolate over truffles. Freeze for 5 minutes or until chocolate has set. Serve.
